JobFullDesc: As the EMEA Business Recruiting Director at Facebook, you’ll lead the team to shape our vision and strategy to hire the best diverse builders for our Business teams, including Marketing and Sales, Partnerships, Operations, Policy and Biz Functions. You will also lead the EMEA Recruiting Operations team that delivers our Regional Recruiting Programs for Tech & Business hiring in the Region including internal hiring, recruiting marketing, referrals & recruiter learning.Your world-class recruiting team of 125+, distributed across EMEA, will play a crucial role in helping Facebook scale our global efforts to add exceptional builders to our diverse teams. Working closely with global counterparts and cross-functional partners you’ll have diversity and inclusion at the heart of your team’s culture and priorities. You will  lead with operational excellence and  a passion for inspiring others and growing careers to achieve results for our Business functions. And by helping us tap into the power of the people who reimagine how our services help people build community, you help build the future of Facebook—and the future of how we bring the world closer
